column9: The menu was limited but the food was good. The service was friendly and efficient. Liked the fact that you helped yourself to bread. A nice little quiet place.

column7: I wish I lived in Lund
column9: Earlier this year we were living near Lund and happened upon this gem.We were doing our normal dithering thing and couldn't make up our minds as to where to eat amongst the restaurants on offer.However one of the patrons looked up and said "you should...More
I have eaten lunch at this place a few times now and I have never had any bad meal. The food has always been served perfectly prepared and by very attentive and nice staff. Highly recommended!

Located in the former Vine och Terrine location (Saluhallen i Lund) this small meat house serves what we found to be nice Danish style smoked meats.  We had a daily special (Dagens) of smoked pork with roasted root veggies.  I was good and filling.  The...More

Eaten lunch here a few times and I couldn't recommend it more, the guys in the kitchen really care about making great food.  If you're in the area, and really even if you're not, it's worth the effort to get here.

Lunds bästa lunchställe! Aldrig blivit besviken. Tyvärr allt för få som har upptäckt denna pärla i Saluhallen i Lund.
Väldigt god och inspirerande mat. Trevligt bemötande av personalen. Bra prisnivå. Tack för lunchen, jag kommer gärna igen!
